text: Faces are an English rock band that was formed in 1969. The group broke up in 2011 and later reunited. The band members are Glen Matlock, Ian McLagan, Kenny Jones, Jesse Ed Davis, Mick Hucknall, Rod Stewart, Ronnie Lane, Ronnie Woods, and Tetsu Yamauchi. The Faces have released four studio albums and have toured in autumn 1975. title: Faces (band)
